name: list_builder
description: Dynamic list builder with add/remove functionality
instructions: Add items to your list. You can reorder, edit, or remove items.

name: soared_form
description: Structured form for SOARED story framework (Situation, Obstacle, Action, Result, Evaluation, Discovery)
instructions: Fill in each field: Situation, Obstacle, Action, Result, Evaluation, Discovery.

name: skill_tagger
description: Tag and categorize skills from stories
instructions: Tag skills mentioned in your stories. Use the Skills Library for reference.

name: ranking_grid
instructions: Compare items pairwise to establish priority order from 1-10.

name: mbti_selector
instructions: Enter your 4-letter personality code from 16personalities.com.

name: budget_calculator
instructions: Enter your monthly expenses to calculate annual needs and minimum hourly rate.

name: flow_tracker
description: Daily tracker for energy and focus levels on activities
instructions: Rate each activity on energy (-2 to +2) and focus level. Mark high-flow activities.

name: life_dashboard
description: Dashboard for rating life areas (work, play, love, health)
instructions: Rate each life area (work, play, love, health) from 1-10 and add notes.

name: mindset_profiles
instructions: Review the five designer mindsets and select characters that represent each.

name: failure_reframer
description: Tool for reframing failures as learning opportunities
instructions: Describe a failure, then reframe it as a learning opportunity.

name: idea_tree
instructions: Start with a central word and branch out with related ideas and possibilities.

name: job_combiner
description: Combine ideas into potential job descriptions
instructions: Combine elements from your idea trees into potential job descriptions.

name: career_timeline
instructions: Plot key milestones for the next 5 years including work and life events.

name: career_assessment
instructions: Score this career option on coherence, work needs, life needs, and unknowns.

name: job_analyzer
instructions: Paste job descriptions to extract keywords, requirements, and patterns.

name: credential_writer
instructions: Rewrite your experience using keywords and language from job descriptions.

name: resume_builder
instructions: Build your resume section by section using your prepared content.

name: company_tracker
instructions: Maintain your list of target companies with status and notes.

name: company_researcher
instructions: Research and document key information about target companies.

name: research_tracker
instructions: Track your research progress across companies.

name: contact_tracker
instructions: Track contacts at each company with relationship status.

name: networking_tracker
instructions: Log daily networking activities and connection requests.

name: outreach_tracker
instructions: Log outreach attempts, responses, and follow-up actions.

name: meeting_prep
instructions: Prepare for meetings with research, questions, and talking points.

name: meeting_notes
instructions: Capture key points, action items, and follow-ups from meetings.

name: referral_tracker
instructions: Track referrals received and their outcomes.

name: opportunity_tracker
instructions: Track job opportunities through the application pipeline.
